ARABIC: نَبِّئْ عِبَادِىٓ أَنِّىٓ أَنَا ٱلْغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Tell My slaves that I am the Ever-Forgiving, the Most Merciful,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Announce to My creatures that I am indeed forgiving and kind,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (O Prophet), declare to My servants that I am indeed Ever Forgiving, Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad), tell My servants that I am All-forgiving and All-merciful
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Inform My bondmen that undoubtedly, I surely am the Oft-Forgiving, the Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Declare to My servants that I am truly the Forgiving, the Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Inform My servants that I am the Forgiving, the Merciful,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Tell My servants I am the All-forgiving, the All-compassionate,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Announce, (O Muhammad) unto My slaves that verily I am the Forgiving, the Merciful,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Tell My servants that I alone am the Forgiving, the Merciful One,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Declare thou unto My bondmen: verily I! I am the Forgiver, the Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Inform my servants that I am indeed the All-forgiving, the All-merciful,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Tell My servants that I am indeed the Oft-forgiving, Most Merciful;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Declare (O Muhammad SAW) unto My slaves, that truly, I am the Oft-Forgiving, the Most-Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Tell My worshipers that I am the Forgiving, the Most Merciful,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Inform My servants that I am the Forgiver, the Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [O Muhammad], inform My servants that it is I who am the Forgiving, the Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:49] Tell, inform, O Muhammad (s), My servants that verily I am the Forgiving, of believers, the Merciful, to them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Announce, (0 Muhammad) unto My slaves) tell my servants (that verily I am the Forgiving) of sins, (the Merciful) towards him who dies in a state of repentance.
